column4: hi, anyone knows if the fonts coming with ubuntu are free for  commercial use ?
I believe that the fonts installed by default with ubuntu will be free.
yea but under what license ? ununtu is free so it can distribute it on some "free license" but i cant
I think everything in the main repo (not universe restricted or multiverse) is free for commercial use. After all canonical is a commercial entity
ok, great i wanted to make shore it wasn't covered with some GPL alike license, tnx
Obviously you gotta be safe legally tho
